item.title: Report X-2024101036
item.description:
Report X-2024101036

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T06:17:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-09
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED INTO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE AND USED THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET. FOLLOWING THE GUIDELINES THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKER AND ALL AFFECTED CARDBOARD BACK TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.

item.title: Report X-2024101037
item.description:
Report X-2024101037

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T06:17:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-09
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SMALL SORT NOTICED LEAKING PACKAGE WITH A SMALL PUDDLE. RESPONDER CALLED, WHO DISCOVERED LEAKING PACKAGE WITH LIMITED QUANTITY. INSIDE THERE WAS A SMALL AMOUNT OF KRAFT PAPER AND AN AEROSOL HAIR MOUSSE. THE PLASTIC LID WAS OF THE AEROSOL AND THE PUMP HAD SPRAYED THE INSIDE OF THE BOX.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: TWILIGHT RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO DOOR 70 UNLOAD FOR A LEAKING HAZ-MAT PACKAGE. RESPONDER PICKED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER EVALUATION. RESPONDER NOTED THAT 1 OF THE 4 BOTTLES WAS LEAKING DUE TO A LOOSE CAP.

item.title: Report X-2024100952
item.description:
Report X-2024100952

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LOADER NOTICED STAIN ON PACKAGE AS SHE TRIED TO REMOVE HAZMAT PAPERS, THEN CALLED A RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED CORRUGATED PACKAGE WITH FLAMMABLE 3 DIAMOND LABEL LEAKING A SMALL AMOUNT ON ONE SIDE. INSIDE WERE TWO CORRUGATED BOXES, EACH WITH A 5 LITER PLASTIC BOTTLE INSIDE. ONE LID WAS LOOSE WITH A LOOSE SEAL. THAT BOX LEAKED ON THE OTHER INNER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024100819
item.description:
Report X-2024100819

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-16T09:16:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED INTO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER OUTSIDE DOOR 297. RESPONDER READ THE DECSION TREE TO FIND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER FOLLOWED GUIDLINES ON RESPONSE SHEET TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
